name: NEON (itch) (Crumbly)
description:
You are a NEON cube trying to get out of this dark world! Climb up to get to the light at the top. Use direction keys and spacebar to jump, however you can jump farther the longer you hold spacebar! This is the first game I have ever made and is kind of short because stuff came up but I will definitely come back to add more one day. This took me about two weeks to make as well,  so I hope you enjoy! 

It is pretty difficult but you'll get the hang of it haha
